trans-unit.source: Contains arguments associated with changes to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />.
trans-unit.target: Contém argumentos associados às alterações em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />.

trans-unit.source: Attached events supported by this delegate include are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> class, and include <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), and <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).
trans-unit.target: Eventos anexados tem suportados por este delegado incluem são fornecidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> classe e incluir <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), e <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).

trans-unit.source: The input device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: O dispositivo de entrada associado a este evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> object associated with this event.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs" /> class, taking a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> as initial values for the class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs" /> classe, levando a especificada <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> como valores iniciais para a classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets control text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém controle texto associado a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any control text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém qualquer texto de controle associado ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador genérico a ser chamado de uma forma específica ao tipo.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: O destino no qual chamar o manipulador.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Invoca manipuladores de eventos em uma forma específica de tipo, o que pode aumentar a eficiência do sistema de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação converte o manipulador genérico como um <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> e, em seguida, invoca.

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre esse padrão de implementação e os motivos para ele, consulte <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> e [visão geral sobre eventos roteados](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets system text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto do sistema associado a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any system text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém qualquer texto de sistema associado ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets input text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém entrada texto associado a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the input text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto de entrada associado ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> associado com um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> object containing the text composition associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> objeto que contém a composição de texto associada ao evento.
